info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63777
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 63777
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns1.alwaysdata.com.
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48763
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 48763
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1681823281 3600 900 1209600 300

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42782
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42782
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"sendinblue-code:15754e1df38b862433eadf5bfaf41a3e"
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.mailjet.com include:spf.sendinblue.com mx ~all"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24953
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24953
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	0 parse.mailjet.com.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43425
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43425
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.mediature.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1;p=none;"

info.name: security.txt File
author: bad5ect0r
noraj
info.description: File similar to robots.txt but intended to be read by humans wishing to contact a websiteâ€™s owner about security issues. Often defines a security policy and contact details.

request:
GET /.well-known/security.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: mediature.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 126
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self';base-uri 'self';font-src 'self' https: data: https://client.crisp.chat/static/;form-action 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';img-src 'self' data: https://*.crisp.chat/;object-src 'none';script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://client.crisp.chat/;script-src-attr 'none';connect-src 'self' https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr/ wss://client.relay.crisp.chat/ https://client.crisp.chat/static/ https://storage.crisp.chat/users/upload/ https://sentry.incubateur.net/;style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline' https://client.crisp.chat/;upgrade-insecure-requests
Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: require-corp
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin
Date: Sun, 31 Dec 2023 06:29:53 GMT
Etag: "rgk8h1k7cw3i"
Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off
X-Download-Options: noopen
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none
X-Request-Id: b4a97452-ee7d-4f68-a096-84d9c0528b02
X-Xss-Protection: 0

Contact: https://github.com/inclusion-numerique/mediature/issues
Expires: 2024-01-07T06:29:53.324Z
Preferred-Languages: fr, en

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
